main.name: Shahzad Ahmed
main.bio: - As a senior full-stack developer with 7 years of experience and a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, I've been working on various projects as a full-stack developer in a variety of industries, ranging from startups to enterprise companies.
main.bio1: - My objective is simply to be the best web developer I can be and to contribute to the technology industry all that I know and can do.
main.bio2: - I'm dedicated to perfecting my craft by learning from seasoned developers.
main.bio3: - I studied Engineering and I believe that my understanding of working as a team are skills that will contribute to my overall success as a developer.
main.bio4: I love working with great people, inspiring others, and being inspired.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: - Studying and Developing under 'Harder Choices and Easy Life'

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: - I've been working as a Toptal freelancer on a wide range of projects, providing full-stack development, product design, feature definition, and UX design for diverse project initiatives.
work.description1: - Contributed to product design, feature definition, and development of MVP for location-based iOS chat app; designing custom protocol in Objective-C, using Parse as backend for end-to-end message encryption.
work.description2: Technologies: JavaScript, Typescript, React, Angular, Vue, Node.js, Next.js, Gatsby.js, Django

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: - Converted the conceptual idea of the Learning Management System(LMS) into a real-working product with Vue.js and Django.
work.description1: - Collaborated with the product owner, marketing team, and designer to clarify requirements.
work.description2: - Developed a single-page application with Vue.js, focusing on mobile responsiveness.
work.description3: Technologies: Vue.js, LMS, Javascript, Node.js, TailwindCSS

work.title: Junior Software Engineer
work.description: - Worked as a junior software engineer with React, Vue.js, and Angular for front-end development and Node.js, Django and Ruby on Rails for back-end development.
work.description1: - Implemented LMS business logic, including administration, documentation, tracking, and reporting in the back-end with Django and DRF.
work.description2: Technologies: JavaScript, Typescript, React, Angular, Vue, Node.js, Django

projects.title: E-Learning Platform - Create&Learn
projects.category: Greatest Online Learning Platform Using React, Node, Next.js, GraphQL, Zoom Api

projects.title: Education App
projects.category: Web and Mobile Development using React/React Native techs

projects.title: StoryTree - Django, React Native based Social App
projects.category: StoryTree is social networking app that makes relatives be in touch with their loved ones in an easy way.

testimonials.text: Shahzad Ahmed is an outstanding software engineer and truly one of the best communicators I've ever had the pleasure to work with.
testimonials.user: Yoko Kaku - Technical Manager from LingoDeer

testimonials.text: His engineering experience crosses the entire web stack - most recently React/Redux and Node application development for GraphQL Designer - to rapidly prototype a full-stack GraphQL application. His engineering approach emphasizes building truly scalable applications with AWS EC2, integrating dynamic load balancing and scalable servers
testimonials.user: Mike Atkin - Product Manager from Toptal
